returns._0: voteType The vote type (NONE, LIKE, or DISLIKE)

params.limit: Maximum number of whispers to return
Maximum number of whispers to return
Maximum number of whispers to return

params.encryptedContentHandle: Encrypted content handle (used if contentMode is ENCRYPTED)
params.plainContent: Plain text content (used if contentMode is PLAIN)

deleteWhisper(uint256).notice: Soft delete a whisper (only author can delete)

getMyVote(uint256).notice: Get caller's vote status for a whisper

getMyWhispers(uint256,uint256).notice: Get whispers posted by the caller

getPrivateInbox(uint256,uint256).notice: Get private whispers received by the caller

getWhisperVoteCount(uint256).notice: Get vote counts for a whisper (returns encrypted handles)

grantDecryptAccess(uint256,address).notice: Grant decrypt access to an address for an encrypted whisper

requestDecryptAccess(uint256).notice: Request decryption access for a PUBLIC encrypted whisper (anyone can call)

revokeDecryptAccess(uint256,address).notice: Revoke decrypt access (note: cannot revoke ACL permissions, only emit event)

voteWhisper(uint256,uint8).notice: Vote on a whisper (like or dislike)

userdoc.notice: A decentralized message board supporting public/private and plain/encrypted messages using FHEVM
